Articles.Content: It’d be nice to be able to add waypoints on planets to mark places of interest or landing spots. You could add waypoints from the map view or from satellites.
I also miss this now without Kerbnet tool
Having the waypoints visible in flight view in addition to map view and the nav ball would be really nice. Or make it a feature to unlock with science.
Fingers crossed for Kerbnet 2.0 in the science update!
I agree. Being able to mark an orbit or landing place on the map so other players can see it would be very useful for multiplayer.
Maybe that's overkill but it would be really cool to build your own GPS system with that ability and coordinates, maybe that could also be a requirement for automatic rovers?
